021import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.Icon;
022import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.ActionType;
023import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.SwitchPageAction;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
027
028import java.util.Collections;
029import java.util.UUID;
030
031/**
032 * BackIcon
033 *
034 * @author creatorfromhell
035 * @since 0.1.3.0
036 */
037public class PreviousPageIcon extends Icon {
038
039  public PreviousPageIcon(final UUID id, final int slot, final String menu, final int page, final ActionType type) {
040
041    super(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("RED_WOOL", 1)
042                  .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPageDisplay"), id))
043                  .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPage"), id))), null);
044
045    this.slot = slot;
046
047    actions.add(new SwitchPageAction(menu, page, type));
048  }
049}
